docs.title: PACS retrieve
docs.text: Welcome

docs.title: CLI Reference
docs.text: This page provides documentation for our command line tools.

docs.title: pacs-retrieve
docs.text: PACS query and retrieve tool.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: No arguments available

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default --version Show version info and exit. No - --help Show this message and exit. No - tui Start the TUI. No - list-series-for-study Get the series for a study. No - list-studies-name Get the studies for a patient name,... No - list-studies-patient-id Get the studies for a patient ID,... No - list-studies-accession-number List the studies for an accession number,... No - list-studies-date Get all studies between two dates,... No - studyuid-from-acc-number-file Load a CSV file, read the column... No - echo-pacs Send C-ECHO to server. No - download-from-patientid-date Download the images from the patientID and... No - download-from-name-date Download the images from the patient name... No - download-from-accession-number Download the images from the accession... No - download-from-studyuid Download a study, filtering for modalities. No - download-from-studyuid-file Download the studies listed in file... No - deident-check-files Check files against the filters in the... No - deident-retain-patient-id-name Apply de-identification keeping the... No - deident-replace-patient-id-name Apply de-identification and use a lookup... No - send-data-to-dicom-node Send DICOM files in a folder to a DICOM... No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve tui
docs.text: Start the TUI.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve tui [OPTIONS][SETTINGS_FILE]

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required [SETTINGS_FILE] [default: settings.json] No

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve list-series-for-study
docs.text: Get the series for a study.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve list-series-for-study [OPTIONS] STUDY_UID [MODALITIES]...

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required STUDY_UID StudyInstanceUID Yes

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve list-studies-name
docs.text: Get the studies for a patient name, filtering for modalities.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve list-studies-name [OPTIONS] PATIENT_NAME [MODALITIES]...

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required PATIENT_NAME Patient name to query Yes

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve list-studies-patient-id
docs.text: Get the studies for a patient ID, filtering for modalities.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve list-studies-patient-id [OPTIONS] PATIENT_ID [MODALITIES]...

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required PATIENT_ID Patient ID to query Yes

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -d, --study_descr TEXT Study description for filtering No - -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve list-studies-accession-number
docs.text: List the studies for an accession number, filtering for modalities.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve list-studies-accession-number [OPTIONS] ACCESSION_NUMBER [MODALITIES]...

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required ACCESSION_NUMBER Accession number (16 characters). Yes

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve list-studies-date
docs.text: Get all studies between two dates, filtering any of the study descriptions and modalities. Does not download images. The number of responses from the PACS is limited, if no results show try more filtering (descriptions and/or modalities or shorten the date range).

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve list-studies-date [OPTIONS]

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: No arguments available

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -s, --start [%Y-%m-%d|%Y%m%d] Start date Yes - -e, --end [%Y-%m-%d|%Y%m%d] End date [default: 2025-05-22] No - -d, --study_descr TEXT Study description for filtering, can be used multiple times. No - -p, --patient_id TEXT Patient ID for filtering No - -m, --modalities TEXT Modalities used for filtering, can be used multiple times. No - -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve studyuid-from-acc-number-file
docs.text: Load a CSV file, read the column 'AccessionNumber' and write all studies to output. Does not download images.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve studyuid-from-acc-number-file [OPTIONS] FILENAME [OUTPUT]

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required FILENAME [required] No

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: Arguments

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -v Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve download-from-patientid-date
docs.text: Download the images from the patientID and date, filtering for modalities.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve download-from-patientid-date [OPTIONS] PATIENT_ID STUDY_DATE:[%Y-%m-%d|%Y%m%d]

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required PATIENT_ID [required] No STUDY_DATE:[%Y-%m-%d|%Y%m%d] [required] No

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -m, --modality TEXT Filter series based on modalities No - -s, --sop-class-uid TEXT Filter series based on SOPClassUID No - --dumpdir DIRECTORY Override output folder. No - -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.text: Download the studies listed in file (column name: StudyInstanceUID), filtering for modalities and/or sop_class_uid.

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required FILENAME Input Yes

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -m, --modality TEXT Filter series based on modalities No - -s, --sop-class-uid TEXT Filter series based on SOPClassUID No - --already-processed FILE File with already processed UIDs. No - --dumpdir DIRECTORY Override output folder. [default: dumpdir] No - -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.text: Check files against the filters in the recipe and log the results.

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required INPUT_DIR input folder. Yes

docs.title: Options

docs.title: pacs-retrieve deident-retain-patient-id-name
docs.text: Apply de-identification keeping the existing patient name and id.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve deident-retain-patient-id-name [OPTIONS] INPUT_DIR OUTPUT_DIR

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required INPUT_DIR input folder. Yes OUTPUT_DIR output folder. Yes

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -r, --recipe PATH Recipe to de-identify No - -d, --date-offset INTEGER Date offset to de-identify No - --xnat-project TEXT Add PatientComments tag for importing into the correct XNAT project No - --xnat-prefix TEXT Prefix added subject and session field for XNAT No - -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve deident-replace-patient-id-name
docs.text: Apply de-identification and use a lookup table to update patient name and id.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve deident-replace-patient-id-name [OPTIONS] INPUT_DIR OUTPUT_DIR PATIENT_MAPPING

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required INPUT_DIR input folder. Yes OUTPUT_DIR output folder. Yes PATIENT_MAPPING CSV/XSLX file with the original patient IDs and the new ones. Yes

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -r, --recipe PATH Recipe to de-identify No - -d, --date-offset INTEGER Date offset to de-identify No - -e, --time-offset INTEGER Time offset to de-identify No - --xnat-project TEXT Add PatientComments tag for importing into the correct XNAT project No - --xnat-prefix TEXT Prefix added subject and session field for XNAT No - --pixel-anonymize Perform pixel anonymization No - -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: pacs-retrieve send-data-to-dicom-node
docs.text: Send DICOM files in a folder to a DICOM Store SCP node.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: pacs-retrieve send-data-to-dicom-node [OPTIONS] DESTINATION PORT DATA_FOLDER

docs.title: Arguments
docs.text: Name Description Required DESTINATION Address of the destination DICOM node Yes PORT Port of the destination DICOM node Yes DATA_FOLDER File or folder to upload. Yes

docs.title: Options
docs.text: Name Description Required Default -r, --recursive Recursive scanning of input No - -v, --verbose Print more output No - -vv Print even more output No - --help Show this message and exit. No -

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
This needs a settings.json file with the following data: 

{
  "server_ae_title": "SOMETHING",
  "server_ae_ip": "SOMETHING",
  "server_ae_port": SOMETHING,
  "client_ae_title": "SOMETHING",
  "client_ae_port": SOMETHING,
  "base_folder": "dumpdir",
  "folder_template": "${PatientID}/${StudyDate}/${StudyDescription}/${Modality}/${FolderUID}_${SeriesDescription}",
  "study_columns": [
    {"name": "Index"},
    {"name": "PatientID"},
    {"name": "StudyDate"},
    {"name": "StudyDescription", "justify": "left"}
  ],
  "series_columns": [
    {"name": "Index"},
    {"name": "SeriesInstanceUID", "justify": "left", "no_wrap":  true},
    {"name": "Modality"},
    {"name": "SeriesNumber"},
    {"name": "SeriesDescription", "justify": "left"}
  ]
}
Search strategy for settings file:

  1. 'PACS_RETRIEVE_SETTINGS' environment value
  2. 'settings.json' in current directory
  3. '~/.config/pacs_retrieve/settings.json'

docs.title: Template
docs.text:
Folder template can contain any of the following items:

  • PatientName
  • PatientID
  • StudyDescription
  • StudyDate
  • StudyTime
  • Modality
  • SeriesDescription
  • SeriesNumber
  • SeriesInstanceUID
  • FolderUID (Uses the uid_mapping provided to RetrievePacs class)
  • StudyInstanceUID
  • AccessionNumber

docs.title: names:
docs.text:
• StudyInstanceUID
  • PatientID
  • PatientName
  • PatientSex
  • PatientBirthDate
  • StudyID
  • StudyDate
  • StudyDescription
  • StudyTime
  • AccessionNumber

docs.title: justify
docs.text:
• default
  • left
  • center
  • right
  • full

docs.title: no_wrap
docs.text:
• true
  • false

docs.title: API
docs.text: This is the API-level reference to the PACS retrieve project.

Name Description create_series_table

Create a rich Table from the series data.

docs.text:

    series: list[SeriesData],
    title: str = "Series found",
    columns: Optional[list[ColumnLayout]] = None,
) -> Table

Parameters:

docs.title: Query
docs.text:
DIMSE-C C-FIND Service

Module for querying a DICOM SCU using the C-FIND service.

Classes:

Name Description DicomStatus

DICOM C-FIND status codes

QueryError

Query exception

QueryPacs

Class to perform the actual query.

Functions:

Name Description get_date_query

Convert one of two datetime.date objects to a DICOM compatible date range.

docs.title: DicomStatus
docs.text:
Bases: Enum

DICOM C-FIND status codes

Attributes:

Name Type Description CANCEL

Matching terminated due to Cancel request

DATASET_DOES_NOT_MATCH_SOP_CLASS

Error Data Set does not match SOP Class

OUT_OF_RESOURCES

Refused Out of resources

PENDING_0

Matches are continuing - Current Match is supplied and any

PENDING_1

Matches are continuing - Warning that one or more

SOP_CLASS_NOT_SUPPORTED

Refused SOP Class not supported

SUCCESS

Matching is complete - No final Identifier is supplied.

UNABLE_TO_PROCESS

Failed Unable to process

UNKNOWN

Unknown

docs.title: CANCEL
docs.text:
CANCEL = 65024

Matching terminated due to Cancel request

docs.title: DATASET_DOES_NOT_MATCH_SOP_CLASS
docs.text:
DATASET_DOES_NOT_MATCH_SOP_CLASS = 43264

Error Data Set does not match SOP Class

docs.title: OUT_OF_RESOURCES
docs.text:
OUT_OF_RESOURCES = 42752

Refused Out of resources

docs.title: PENDING_0
docs.text:
PENDING_0 = 65280

Matches are continuing - Current Match is supplied and any Optional Keys were supported in the same manner as Required Keys.

docs.title: PENDING_1
docs.text:
PENDING_1 = 65281

Matches are continuing - Warning that one or more Optional Keys were not supported for existence for this Identifier.

docs.title: SOP_CLASS_NOT_SUPPORTED
docs.text:

docs.title: DicomStatus
docs.text:
Bases: Enum

DICOM C-MOVE status codes

Attributes:

Name Type Description CANCEL

Cancel.

DATASET_DOESNT_MATCH_SOP_CLASS

Data Set does not match SOP Class.

FAILED_UNABLE_TO_PROCESS

Unable to process.

MOVE_DESTINATION_UNKNOWN

Move Destination unknown.

OUT_OF_RESOURCES_UNABLE_TO_CALCULATE_NUMBER_OF_MATCHES

Out of resources - Unable to calculate number of matches.

OUT_OF_RESOURCES_UNABLE_TO_PERFORM_SUB_OPERATIONS

Out of resources - Unable to perform sub-operations.

PENDING

Sub-operations are continuing.

SUB_OPERATIONS_COMPLETE_ONE_OR_MORE_FAILURES

Sub-operations Complete - One or more Failures.

SUCCESS

Sub-operations Complete - No Failures.

UNKNOWN

Unknown.

docs.title: handle_store
docs.text:
handle_store(
    event: Event,
    base_folder: Path,
    folder_template: str,
    anonimyzer: Anonymizer,
    uid_mapping: Callable[[str], str],
    folder_callback: Callable[[Path], None],
    sop_class_uid: Optional[Iterable[str]],
) -> int

Callback function for storing a DICOM dataset.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default Event

The dataset to store.

required Path

Base folder for storing files.

required str

Template for creating folders inside the base_folder.

required Anonymizer

Anonymizer to anonymize the dataset.

required Callable[[str], str]

Mapping from UID to series index.

required Callable[[Path], None]

Callback function for returning the final path.

required Optional[Iterable[str]]

Optional SOPClassUIDs to process, others will be ignored.

required

Returns:

Type Description int

DICOM status code.

docs.title: get_settings_filename
docs.text:
get_settings_filename(filename: Path) -> Path

Determine path of settings file.

Search strategy:

  1. 'PACS_RETRIEVE_SETTINGS' environment value
  2. 'settings.json' in current directory
  3. '~/.config/pacs_retrieve/settings.json'
